channel.title: Windows on Modeling of Everything
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Modeling of Everything

item.title: Setup WSL2 (windows subsystem linux 2) in windows 10
item.description: Ever since Microsoft changed the CEO, it starts to embrace the open source world by annoucing new tools (VS code) as well as adding new features to windows. Now windows 10 becomes more friendly for developers. The feature we are going to test drive today is one of them. Background on WSL1/WSL2/Docker Thanks to the architecture of windows NT, it can actually “Simulate” any operation systems (OS) in the system level.
